name: GameofNim
0:
”Alexa launch Game of Nim”
”I pick 1”
”I take 2”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: game of nim
des:
The is the game of Nim. The games starts with 20 sticks. The goal of the game is to not pick the last stick. 
The user and Alexa take turn picking 1 or 2 sticks. The last one to pick loses. A new game starts immediately after the the current one finishes.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
